metadata.title: CVE-2024-35962 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:netfilter: complete validation of user inputIn my recent commit, I missed that do_replace() handlersuse copy_from_sockptr() (which I fixed), followedby unsafe copy_from_sockptr_offset() calls.In all functions, we can perform the @optlen validationbefore even calling xt_alloc_table_info() with the followingcheck:if ((u64)optlen < (u64)tmp.size + sizeof(tmp))        return -EINVAL;

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
